abstract: Two insiders had said Kyphon, a unit of Medtronic, improperly persuaded hospitals to keep people overnight for a simple outpatient procedure to repair small fissures of the spine.
snippet: Two insiders had said Kyphon, a unit of Medtronic, improperly persuaded hospitals to keep people overnight for a simple outpatient procedure to repair small fissures of the spine.
lead_paragraph: A unit of Medtronic defrauded Medicare of hundreds of millions of dollars, according to a civil lawsuit that was unsealed Thursday and simultaneously settled with the Justice Department.

headline.main: Medtronic Settles a Civil Lawsuit on Allegations of Medicare Fraud
headline.print_headline: Medtronic Settles a Civil Lawsuit On Allegations of Medicare Fraud
